content:
In that case, we would need to increase the height of the cabin. Assuming an average standing height of 1.75 meters, we could increase the height of the cabin to about 1.9 meters. This would increase the overall height of Pig, which would need to be taken into account when designing the landing gear and other systems.

Taking into account the increased height of the cabin, the revised dimensions for Pig could be approximately 8.5 meters in length, 3.5 meters in width, and 2.7 meters in height. The revised MTOW would be approximately 3,500 kg.
